metadata.name: Mahsa Amini
metadata.description:
On 16 September 2022, a 22-year-old Iranian woman named Mahsa Amini, also known as Jina Amini or Zhina Amini, died in Tehran, Iran, under suspicious circumstances, allegedly due to police brutality. The Guidance Patrol, a vice squad of the Law Enforcement Command of Islamic Republic of Iran, arrested Amini.

Her death started a revolution...
I think her soul returned to earth with the Achaemenians army...

90% of the income goes to Mehsa Amini's family...
